name: Window Man
description:
Summary

A 3D platformer where you play as Window Man. Window Man is trying to get home, but unfortunately, he is made of un-tempered glass, and is only a single pane!  As a result, Window Man is quite fragile, so steer clear of hard surfaces.

Created by Cadoink for the Godot Wild Jam #44

Controls
  • Move - WASD
  • Move Camera - Mouse
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Action - E
  • Menu - Tab
Godot Wild Jam #44
